main event: An unidentified object was observed briefly for 1-2 minutes before disappearing.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on 5 November 1954,The observation type was Ground-Visual,The report suggests the possibility of the object being a meteor or meteorite,The object was observed for a short duration, and then it vanished,The record card is part of the Project Blue Book files.
witness description: no witnesses confirmed in the report
